channel.title: Projects | Prof. Dr. Bradley P. Ladewig - Academic Website

item.title: H2-Global
item.description: H2-Global is a project supported by the FNR, to work on electrochemical methods for green hydrogen production from a range of feedstocks. The project supports an extended scientific visit by Professor Manoj Neergat from IIT Bombay, working in Luxembourg for 12 months spread over a three year period.

item.title: Hydrogen from Waste Plastic and Biomass
item.description: HyWay is a Marie Sklowdowska-Curie Staff Exchange project, coordinated by Prof. Bradley Ladewig.

item.title: Luxembourg Hydrogen Valley
item.description: End-to-end value chain in green hydrogen in Luxembourg. See external website for more details.
